title: Deep elf high priest
data:

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

|   |                                                                                               |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An exalted servant of the ancient dark god of the deep elves, basking in hellish death magic. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Deep elf high priests** are elven clergy that generally serve a supporting role to other deep elven mages. Along with the usual priestly [smiting](/Smiting "Smiting"), expect to be blasted with [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation"). They can most often be found in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls") (especially the bottom level) and [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                          |                                                     |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Aura of Brilliance](/Aura_of_Brilliance "Aura of Brilliance")           | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Call Down Damnation](/Call_Down_Damnation "Call Down Damnation") (3d15) | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Malign Offering](/Malign_Offering "Malign Offering") (2d17)             | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting") (7-17)                                     | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Having a deep elf high priest around makes other deep elves significantly more dangerous. Not only can they heal their allies while damaging you, but Aura of Brilliance makes deep elven spellcasters even more dangerous than they already are.
- If you can fight deep elf high priests on their own, they become significantly less threatening. This is especially true once you close to melee range, which generally discourages them from blasting you with [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation").
- [Silence](/Silence "Silence") is always useful, especially since it shuts down any other dangerous casters in the vicinity.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), [Aura of Brilliance](/Aura_of_Brilliance "Aura of Brilliance") will be renamed to **Prayer of Brilliance** and become an AoE buff instead of an aura.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), deep elf high priests could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), they could cast [Twisted Resurrection](/Twisted_Resurrection "Twisted Resurrection").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), deep elf high priests could cast [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon").
- In [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), [Malign Offering](/Malign_Offering "Malign Offering") replaced [Minor Healing](/Minor_Healing "Minor Healing").
html:
Deep elf high priest

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf high priest e 
HP 32-66
HD 11
XP 896
Speed 10
AC 4
EV 12
Will 80
Attack1 14 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Evil

Speaks
Warm-blooded
An exalted servant of the ancient dark god of the deep elves, basking in hellish death magic.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Deep elf high priests are elven clergy that generally serve a supporting role to other deep elven mages. Along with the usual priestly smiting, expect to be blasted with damnation. They can most often be found in the Elven Halls (especially the bottom level) and the Vaults.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Aura of Brilliance Priest flag
Slot2 Call Down Damnation (3d15) Priest flag
Slot3 Malign Offering (2d17) Priest flag
Slot4 Smiting (7-17) Priest flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Having a deep elf high priest around makes other deep elves significantly more dangerous. Not only can they heal their allies while damaging you, but Aura of Brilliance makes deep elven spellcasters even more dangerous than they already are.
  • If you can fight deep elf high priests on their own, they become significantly less threatening. This is especially true once you close to melee range, which generally discourages them from blasting you with damnation.
  • Silence is always useful, especially since it shuts down any other dangerous casters in the vicinity.

History

  • In 0.32, Aura of Brilliance will be renamed to Prayer of Brilliance and become an AoE buff instead of an aura.
  • Prior to 0.28, deep elf high priests could see invisible.
  • Prior to 0.27, they could cast Twisted Resurrection.
  • Prior to 0.18, deep elf high priests could cast Summon Demon.
  • In 0.13, Malign Offering replaced Minor Healing.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Deep_elf_high_priest&oldid=80251"

==Useful Info==
'''Deep elf high priests''' are elven clergy that generally serve a supporting role to other deep elven mages. Along with the usual priestly [[smiting]], expect to be blasted with [[damnation]]. They can most often be found in the [[Elven Halls]] (especially the bottom level) and [[the Vaults]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Having a deep elf high priest around makes other deep elves significantly more dangerous. Not only can they heal their allies while damaging you, but Aura of Brilliance makes deep elven spellcasters even more dangerous than they already are.
*If you can fight deep elf high priests on their own, they become significantly less threatening. This is especially true once you close to melee range, which generally discourages them from blasting you with [[damnation]].
*[[Silence]] is always useful, especially since it shuts down any other dangerous casters in the vicinity.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|[[Aura of Brilliance]] will be renamed to '''Prayer of Brilliance''' and become an AoE buff instead of an aura.}}
*Prior to [[0.28]], deep elf high priests could [[see invisible]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], they could cast [[Twisted Resurrection]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], deep elf high priests could cast [[Summon Demon]]. 
*In [[0.13]], [[Malign Offering]] replaced [[Minor Healing]].
